questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a probabilistic calculation?
options: A strong feeling you are most likely correct

questions.question: Tomas is programming an app to help people find their way in his city. He programs every possible route from the university auditorium to the museum. Which of the following is Tomas likely using?
Why does machine learning find answers in unstructured data more quickly than a programmable computer?
options: Machine learning assembles all the data into a table before calculating.
Machine learning can search every combination of factors very quickly.
Machine learning analyzes every data combination.
Machine learning uses the most sophisticated program code.
questions.correct_answer: Machine learning can search every combination of factors very quickly.

questions.question: Fill in the blank. Machine learning can analyze _______________ data more quickly than a programmable computer can.
Complete the sentence. Machine learning is a type of AI with many advantages over programmable computers, including the distinguishing capability to _______________ and _______________.
